title: Live Updates: Israeli Forces Rescue Hostage From Gaza
content: The Israeli military said it had found a 52-year-old Israeli Arab in a tunnel in southern Gaza. He is the eighth hostage to be rescued alive of the approximately 250 abducted 10 months ago.
summary: The Israeli military said it had found a 52-year-old Israeli Arab in a tunnel in southern Gaza. He is the eighth hostage to be rescued alive of the approximately 250 abducted 10 months ago.

title: In Brazil, Wildfires Roar Across the Pantanal as Rare Wildlife Dies
content: In Brazil, wildfires have roared across the Pantanal, a maze of rivers, forests and marshlands that sprawl over an area 20 times the size of the Everglades.
summary: In Brazil, wildfires have roared across the Pantanal, a maze of rivers, forests and marshlands that sprawl over an area 20 times the size of the Everglades.

title: In Eastern Ukraine, Terrifying Bombardment and Near Total Destruction
content: Powerful guided “glide bombs” have helped Russia raze entire towns with ever greater speed. “When you drive into a ruined town, it’s like hopelessness,” one soldier said.
summary: Powerful guided “glide bombs” have helped Russia raze entire towns with ever greater speed. “When you drive into a ruined town, it’s like hopelessness,” one soldier said.

title: Mexico Pauses Relations With U.S. Embassy Amid Clash Over Judicial Overhaul

title: Solingen, Germany, Becomes Reluctant Symbol of Migration Battles
